A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you love not knowing what the next second will hold\, love being set up for a certain expectation only for the movie to throw that expectation out a second story window\, love being on the edge of your seat because it's obvious that YES the director would be 100% willing to go THERE because nothing is so sacred as to be immune to his wishes\, You Will Love This Movie.\n\nIf you don't like all of the above and are expecting the movie to follow the tried and true Star Wars movie format\, you may enjoy a few scenes but ultimately you're probably going to be disappointed and end up hating the movie.
